message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll see its potential. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to offer $1000000, which is the highest I'm willing to go.
I understand you're willing to go up to $1000000, Bob, but I believe the product's value is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1250000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $1000000, which is my final offer.
